text_block_list.text:
A day off. While wandering around the shopping 
district, I suddenly smelled something nice. A 
sweets shop. Seems like it's freshly baked cookies.
choice_data_list: The color is nice and it looks good!

text_block_list.text:
Thanks! Well~, this morning's batch turned out well! 
It might be twice as crisp as usual!
text_block_list.name: Sweets Store Clerk

text_block_list.text:
Smiles just came naturally when you came across something good. 
That's all it took for the world to seem brighter.

It was refreshing, a comfortable feeling. 
If she was here, I'm sure she'd say――
Mmmm~, Marvelous☆ It smells good!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text: Ohー, huh, it's Trainer!!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
After eating 2 servings of cookies, 
we walked around the shopping district.

Those cookies! They were very Marvelous, weren't they?☆ 
I met up with Trainer so today's already been Marvelous★
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
That's right! Trainer, let's go search for Marvelous together! 
We'll go search the world for a new Marvelous☆★☆
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Searching for Marvelous, huh. It sounds interesting. 
That brilliant world that she sees――I want to get 
a feel for that "Marvelous" world.
choice_data_list: I'll take you up on that offer

text_block_list.text:
Alrightーー! 
Rather than being alone, being together is more Marvelous☆
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text: Ooh~! Look at the bonsai in that garden~☆
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
There was a wonderful bonsai in the garden. 
While seeking Marvelous, I ended up staring at the bonsai――
What are you doing, do you have some business with me?
text_block_list.name: Old Man A

text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I was just thinking this bonsai is Marvelous☆ 
Especially the shape of the trunk, it's very Marvelous★
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
The old man's expression became serious. This could be bad. 
I was going to apologize for peeking in without permission but――
Girly, you really do get it, huh……!
text_block_list.name: Old Man A

text_block_list.text:
It's all about that trunk! It took 20 years to get like that! 
I used a wire to arrange it in to that shape.
text_block_list.name: Old Man A
choice_data_list: <size=42>20 years! That's alot of time and effort!</size>

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah! That's really Marvelous☆ 
You've been taking really good care of it, huh!?
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
I'll bet that bonsai grew so beautifully 
in response to your feelings!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
So, that makes this a miraculous Marvelous☆ Seeing something 
so miraculous makes us really happy and Maaarvelous★
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Aaah…… it's been a while since I've felt like this…… 
No matter how old you get, being praised makes you feel happy.
text_block_list.name: Old Man A

text_block_list.text:
The old man spoke so happily. No matter who she talked to, 
they became brighter. That's Marvelous! As expected!

We headed to the park to take a break. Marvelous Sunday spotted 
a girl sitting alone and immediately went over to her.
Hey hey, are you waiting for someone? Your friends?
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
No…… I……just moved here, 
so I haven't made any friends yet……
text_block_list.name: Girl A

text_block_list.text:
I see! In that case, from now on, I'll be your friend! 
Let's play! Is there something you're good at?
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Eh……hide and seek……I guess. 
Because I'm good at finding people……
text_block_list.name: Girl A

text_block_list.text:
Marvelous☆ So you're good at finding people huh?★ 
Then let's start playing hide and seek!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text: O-okay! Then, tell me when both of you are hidden!
text_block_list.name: Girl A

text_block_list.text: So we hid and began playing hide and seek with the girl……

Ah, Onee-chan, I found you! 
And you're underneath there, aren't you!?
text_block_list.name: Girl A

text_block_list.text:
Ah, Onee-chan, I found you! 
And you're underneath there, aren't you!?
text_block_list.name: Girl A

text_block_list.text:
Marvelous☆ You found us already~! 
You're really good at hide and seek, huh!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text: Eh, you think so? But, maybe not that good……ehehe.
text_block_list.name: Girl A

text_block_list.text:
Hey, you're good at hide and seek!? 
Can I join in too?
text_block_list.name: Girl B

text_block_list.text: Me too, me too! If you're that good, I want to try too!
text_block_list.name: Boy A

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah, Marvelous☆ 
Playing together with everyone will definitely be more fun★
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
You really are good, huh! 
But, tomorrow I won't lose!
text_block_list.name: Boy A

text_block_list.text: I won't either! See you!
text_block_list.name: Girl A

text_block_list.text:
To think you'd make so many friends in just one day! 
You really are Maaaaaarvelous☆
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
choice_data_list: A genius at making friends too?

text_block_list.text:
No. It's thanks to Onee-chan and you! 
Um, thanks……let's play again!
text_block_list.name: Girl A

text_block_list.text:
Yeah! Next time, let's play with even more people! 
Then it'll be even more Marvelous☆
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Haaa~~~! It was all sparkly, lucky, and happy! 
As I thought, the world is overflowing with Marvelous☆
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
She was the one that was Marvelous. Because 
she was there, her surroundings would naturally 
shine. Today's events reaffirmed that.
choice_data_list: I think it's because of you
I think it's because of you

text_block_list.text:
Ahahaa! Thank you! I'm happy that you'd say that! 
But, I think you could say that about Trainer too!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
That old man, that little girl, and the sweets 
store clerk too! Each and every one of them, 
was Marvelous like I've never seen before!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
That old man looked really happy after what Trainer said! 
That girl seemed more confident in herself too!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
With my Marvelous together with Trainer's Marvelous☆ 
By combining both of them, we get an even more Marvelous★
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
That's why today, was even more Marvelous! 
The first time I've seen such a shiny, sparkly Marvelous☆★☆
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
I could feel that the world was overflowing with Marvelous―― 
Yeah, it was really Marvelous☆ Ahahaa!!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I'm Marvelous after all, 
so obviously Trainer would be Marvelous too☆★☆
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Ah, so it's this. This is……the world that she's seeing. 
I felt like I now knew why she was chasing after Marvelous.

It's a good feeling. For her――no, for the Marvelous of the world! 
I'll continue to support her!
